relationships.description: Harry Potter is angry with Dumbledore, who he feels has let him down.
Harry Potter does not trust Snape and feels that Dumbledore was foolish to do so.
Dumbledore is an enemy of Voldemort, who killed Harry's parents.
Harry Potter and Dumbledore are planning to destroy the Horcrux.
